title: Extra RP From Prepaid Cards?
body: So yesterday, I bought a $25 RP card from my local EB Games. I got home and instead of the usual 2830 RP I was greeted by a lovely 3060 RP! Was just wondering if this is a promotion of some sort, or I just got lucky? I have looked all over the Internet to see if this has happened to anyone else, to no luck.
